text: Mahendra Surasinghe Wijeratne (12 March 1934 - March 2011) was a Sri Lankan politician. He was the former Minister of Livestock Development and Milk Production; and Deputy Minister of Trade and Shipping. Wijeratne was elected Member of Parliament from Mirigama having contested the 1977 general election from the United National Party defeating J. P. Obeysekera. He was married to Mallika Wijeratne. They had three children. His son Udena Wijerathna is a Member of Western Provincial Council and daughter Maheshi is a Consultant Neuro Surgeon. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Cabinet ministers of Sri Lanka Category:Deputy ministers of Sri Lanka Category:Members of the 8th Parliament of Sri Lanka Category:Sinhalese politicians Category:United National Party politicians
